to go down in amount or value very quickly and suddenly: House prices have plummeted in recent months.plummet (by) sth First-half advertising revenues plummeted 13%, compared with the same period a year ago.plummet to sth The food retailer's shares plummeted 17.5p to 227.5p.
a sudden and large reduction in value or amount: a plummet in sth The petrol retailer denies its 25% dividend hike is to prop up the shares after a plummet in the price from 270p to 118p.
